attributes.action: Ban Private Companies From Marking Education Papers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In my opinion i believe that the marking system should be kept within the Education system and not out-sourced to a Private company.
This leaves to much room for error and when there is an error those who have taken the exams are sure to lose out as well as the education system.
If business leaders have no trust in the Education system then in my opinion they would be less willing to trust employees C.V's.

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
